name: sand-veil
description: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
short_description: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
